Title: Sleeveless Jeweled Neckline Evening Dress with  Train

----

Sku: CK48

Sizes: 4, 12, 10, 8, 14, 6

----

Colors: black, red, royal

----

Category: evening, formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: CK48-red-sleeveless-jeweled-neckline-evening-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: The back of the gown stuns with its illusion design and trimmed with jeweled rhinestones around the halter neckline and the waistline line. The rhinestones accent the waistline giving it a belted look. A narrow plunge in the bust adds to the allure of the gown. A high split in the front of the skirt breaks up the length of fabric falling to the floor.
